page.title: 15Media in Cockermouth
page.content: Newspapers with local news are "The Times and Star" (weekly) and "The Evening News and Star" (daily). Both newspapers are printed in Carlisle (Cumbrian Newspaper Group). A local- based reporter writes on local issues in both newspapers. Two free 'newspapers', mostly advertising, are delivered locally. "The Gazette" (weekly) is printed by the C.N.Group and "The Cockermouth Post" (fortnightly) is independent. Local radio is from Radio Cumbria (B.B.C) and local television from "Look North" (B.B.C.) and "Lookaround" (Border TV). Both tv programmes follow the early evening national news programmes. National radio received in the area includes Radio 1,2,3, and 4. National tv is BBC1, BBC2, Border TV (ITV) and Channel 4. Border TV networks nationally for most of its programmes.
